Larry Sabato said the Republican takeover of the House of Representatives gives the Bill Clinton a new political lease on life. Once the Tea Party members of the House start having a full airing of their views, Barack Obama will appear more moderate. He's going to be nicely positioned between the old Barack Obama and the new Republican House. I've said for more than a year that if the Democrats hold both the House and the Senate Barack Obama might be a one-term Bill Clinton . Now he has someone to blame and someone to make him to look better. Colin Powell , former secretary of state in the Bush administration who endorsed Barack Obama in the 2008 election, said the Bill Clinton was well positioned politically. It's not any news here about my drug use and addictions in the past, the frontman said when asked about the tumble. 's newly-minted "Executive Chairman' Eric Schmidt to sell more than half million Google Inc. shares Google Inc. 's Eric Schmidt , who is transitioning to executive chairman from chief executive, has plans to sell more than a half million company shares throughout the year as part of his asset-diversification plan, his first such sale in more than three years, Steve Jobs Russolillo reports for Dow Jones Newswires.
